message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that time is of the essence for you.
I understand time is valuable for both of us, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while. This offer reflects the changing value of money with each round.
Bob, I acknowledge your need for a larger share, but your previous offer was too low for me. This offer is a compromise, considering the value decrease is more significant for you with each round.
